biotools.summary: Tool for visualization of microbial genomes. Chromosome wheels and linear genome maps with user specified features/color coding can be generated interactively. Graphics are created in SVG format.

bioschemas.name: Microbial Genome Viewer
bioschemas.summary: Tool for visualization of microbial genomes. Chromosome wheels and linear genome maps with user specified features/color coding can be generated interactively. Graphics are created in SVG format.
